tagline: A platform for gamers/streamers to provide their casual service.
desc:
__**Use Cases:**__ 
:small_orange_diamond: Hire professional gamer or famous streamer! 
:small_orange_diamond: Hire game coach, level up your skill! 
:small_orange_diamond: Hire strong team mate, face challenge and rank up! 
:small_orange_diamond: Hire players to play your less known multiplayer game! 
:small_orange_diamond: Hang out and socialize with gamers/streamers in a relaxed environment!

__**Application Features:**__ 
:diamonds: Marketplace 
:diamonds: Payment 
:diamonds: Chat 
:diamonds: Gaming Contents 
:diamonds: Event Organizer

__**Tech Stack:**__ 
:small_blue_diamond: React 
:small_blue_diamond: Progressive Web App 
:small_blue_diamond: Styled Component 
:small_blue_diamond: Bootstrap 
:small_blue_diamond: Firebase

tasks.title: Trello Tasks
tasks.desc: We use Trello to manage the tasks within this project, [here](https://trello.com/invite/b/tAyH3oig/a5374e9eaa1bbe644f3e7367d1e23300/game-senshi) is your invitation. Further information on how to use Trello and claim a task can be found in the [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/zero-to-mastery/GameSenshi/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) file on Github.

welcomeMsg: Please take a moment to read through the pinned messages. Here you will find important notes and how to get stated with the project!
